website_summaries.verdict: Exceptionally versatile speaker with 360-degree immersive sound.
pros: The bass packs a punch for a compact speaker, and the mids and trebles are crystal clear
A super-sleek design with a simple control interface
Built-in speakerphone allows you to take calls
cons: The 16-hour battery life can become frustrating for some

website_summaries.verdict: Bose's expensive SoundLink Plus is arguably the best-sounding Bluetooth speaker for its size.
pros: The sleek Bose SoundLink Plus Bluetooth speaker sounds excellent for its compact size, has a built-in handle for easy transport and is water-resistant
Battery life is good at 16 hours, there's a threaded tripod mount on the bottom of the speaker and an integrated microphone for speakerphone calls
cons: Expensive, and the cradle that makes charging easier is an optional $30 accessory

customer_reviews.title: POWERHOUSE!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about a Bose product beside the price. It's a little pricey but as they say "you get what you pay for". However, this little portable guy is a powerhouse! Love the handle, the quality of deep base tones, battery life, portability - love the handle!!! It sounds superior when hanging. Works great on the boat and camping or out by the pool! NOTE: YOU DO NOT NEED THE BASE CHARGER THAT IS RECOMMENDED AND SOLD SEPARATELY - IT COMES WITH A CHARGER THAT WORKS JUST FINE.
customer_reviews.author: H20girl

customer_reviews.title: Never Ending Software Issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these with the thought they could be paired and used in stereo which they can. However, every time you want that, you have to go through several software steps to re-pair them, and as it turns out, the software is buggy and needs updating so the whole thing becomes a time consuming, frustrating hassle. Buy Sonos.
customer_reviews.author: patrick murray

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and product is exactly as reviews stated
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design. All of the reviews I read prior to purchasing the Revolve+ were accurate however I'm noticing slightly more diminished sound quality at full volume. And full volume is loud af, 2-3x louder than my previous Jambox. I wish the base would hit harder but again, it hits plenty hard for a speaker this size. It does sound better placed closer to a wall. Seamless connectivity with Bluetooth. I use mine to stream from iPhone, Amazon Dot and a projector. Haven't tested battery life yet. I'll likely be getting a second to connect the pair as stereo surround for outdoor movie nights. Nice work Bose!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The Bluetooth wake up is a serious issue.
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sounds great battery life is good. The one BIG and I mean BIG issue is the bad bluetooth wake up it has. If you turn the speaker off it doesnt actually turn off it goes into more of a hibernation mode. Which if it didn't tell you (literally it announces what its connected to every 15 or 20 minutes) in the middle of the night when your trying to sleep, would actually be a great idea. This is a software issue that Bose could patch but has not. There is a work around but its really tedious and for 300 you really shouldn't have to jerry rig your speaker. There are others out there.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Edward Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Bose Soundlink Revolve + May 2017
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, strong sound from this little portable speaker. Able to use the equalizer on my smartphone to adjust output if desired. Took less than 5 mins to synch with my phone. First thing I did was go to Youtube on my phone, pull up "Barn Jams" with David Gilmour, Rick Wright, Steve D. and Guy Pratt, and tap play. Sound was exquisite. So much fun to be able to grab music from internet sources such as Youtube and listen to immediately - BB King and Ronnie Earl at Montreux "You're Gonna Miss Me", Fantastic. This speaker has a lovely, warm, rich sound, and you can really crank it up. Well worth the price, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J. Tyrell

customer_reviews.title: Internal battery dead.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the soundlink revolve+ in November and was relatively happy with my purchase then. That was until the day I let the battery completely run out, instead of connecting to the charger at the 5% request. Now I cannot get the device to charge. I have tried different charging cords, the Bose charging cradle(waste of money), and the resseting method told to me buy a Bose customer service rep... nothing has worked, glad I bought this product before it went on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, Static-sounding bass at all volume levels.
customer_reviews.text: The bass was distorted, static-sounding, at every volume level. I looked for remedies online and even check the Bose support website. None of the suggestions online worked. Returned the same day it was delivered for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: muddy sound and weak volume
customer_reviews.text: It's a Bose product so it must be great, right? Wrong. Unless mine was defective. Surprisingly weak volume even with the source turned all the way up. I like to listen to music while exercising but this thing couldn't compete with the volume of the equipment. The second problem was the quality of the sound. It was muddy and had too much bass. I had to change the EQ setting on my phone almost every time I switched to a different album. Even then it wasn't great. The Tremor speaker I used for years (until it died) was so much better than this. I think I'll just buy another of those to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan An

customer_reviews.title: bose ????
customer_reviews.text: are you kidding me this thing should be out of stores excuse me but people please don't waste money on bose find some other brand. the sound from this expensive speaker is so low i did't believe what i'm hearing
customer_reviews.author: Dusan T.

customer_reviews.title: I will Never buy another Bose Product
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth is a nightmare! It will just disconnect and connect to some other device for no reason. It sounds good, but it takes forever to charge! It lasts about half the time it says it does 6-7 hours tops. It seems to eat 10% of power ever time you turn it on for some reason. I would ever buy another Bose product again. Oh yeah! The charger cradle! A real POS that will NOT STAY CONNECTED! Their customer service told me I should be ashamed for using the term POS! are you kidding me!😂. This is THE MOST DISAPPOINTING PRODUCT IVE EVER PURCHASED. Bose was supposed to be quality...JUST THE OPPOSITE! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: A Consumer

customer_reviews.title: After two years
customer_reviews.text: After some two years during which I have had repeated difficulty keeping it paired with my Alexa or anything else, the battery will not charge. The battery in my last couple of mobile phones lasted for 4 to 6 years. The sound is great, but the quality and usability in terms of the Bluetooth and battery leave much to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: mjplatt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Sound not as clear as I had hoped. Bass is overpowering and treble is not high enough, leaving the midrange somewhat muffled. After hearing a UE speaker form a friend, I thought this speaker would blow that one away with clarity. It definitely has better bass, but thats about it. The instruction booklet is terrible, not really giving any instruction at all. I had to google how to know when the speaker is fully charged. I really expected more from Bose, especially when the price is where it's at
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor fitness classes!
customer_reviews.text: I teach outdoor dance fitness classes. I decided to buy this speaker, because my previous $100 boombox wasn't cutting it. I figured I might as well spend some money, and have something quality that would go the distance. And let me tell you, Bose does not disappoint. This super cute, portable speaker produces much louder and better sound than my previous boombox ever did. Plus, the portability, light-weight aspect of it means that I have more capacity to carry other things. I am thrilled with this speaker and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product! The pairing function stopped working after 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! The pairing function stopped working after 10 months of purchase! Amazon and would not help with any type of return or exchange! Do not buy this product, and don’t make big ticket purchases through Amazon is what I learned as a costly lesson!
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Great, thunderous sound from a small speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. I paired it quickly with my phone. It can get loud, which surprised me. I used it for several hours and still had 85% of the battery remaining. I looked at many other Bluetooth leakers, but I am glad I ordered this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok..
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I really thought for the price the sound quality would blow me away... however it performs well. Battery life is great and love being able to have it outside and not worry. Connection to phone is easy and reliable. I do have to say that my $80 speaker that this one replaced had much deeper bass and seemed to perform better at lower volumes. I do like this speaker and think it is quality and haven’t had any issues so I would suggest if looking for a durable outdoor speaker from a reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: They sounded great, but...
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 of these and they sounded great. But I could almost never get them to pair up and play at the same time. It would either only work on one or one would have a small delay. Should of just stuck with the one and not messed with it. The other thing that bugged me about these is it felt like I had to update them all the time. Personally I got a JBL charge 4 and I much prefer it to these.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Quit working on 8/10/19 after one month of light use
customer_reviews.text: Need to get replacement of existing unit. This quit charging and working out of the blue on 8/10/19,it was connected to my phone from night before and heard it beep as if battery was dying , then would not take a charge. I purchased the wireless charge station to try to get the most life i could out of this high dollar unit . Now over $300. gone unless the seller contacts me please.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Frederick

customer_reviews.title: 360 degree sound is great, but this isn't an improvement over SLIII for sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have a soundlink 3 also and I think the sound is better than the revolve+. The revolve still sounds great-- I'm a huge bose fan-- but the bass is deeper on the SLIII and the revolve is a little more tinny. The 360 degree sound is a plus on the revolve because of the flexibility it offers for where you place it, but I prefer the SLIII when I can find a good spot for it. I also like the fact that the revolve will tell you what device name is connected, and you can easily clear the memory to start over in case a bunch of devices have previously connected that you don't want remembered.
customer_reviews.author: I_buy_stuff

customer_reviews.title: Good but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the smaller one, but it really wasnt loud enough so i exchanged it for this bigger plus model, its great sound, and a great speaker, it gets pretty loud, could be louder. hard to give it more than 3 stars just because of the price. There is nothing special about bose speakers. they are good. but i just think these are over priced for what they are. but i do like it, and i like it for a group setting where it evenly distributes the sound all around it.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and base
customer_reviews.text: I must say I'm impressed, as the reviewers were leaning in both directions. I had a Jawbone brick Bluetooth speaker for a few years and was generally happy with it but its effectiveness diminished as Bluetooth standards improved. It finally bit the dust when it would not take a charge anymore. Enter the Bose Revolve + and it connected after a full charge. The companion app from the play store completed the interface. The sound is all enveloping and typically Bose in crispness and base. The only drawback I see it the inability to connect a third device, I tried in vain and couldn't. All in all a solid performer.
customer_reviews.author: Sadrad

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well constructed. I have always heard Bose was overpriced and thought I had paid a premium for the name, until it fell off a railing onto wooden steps 8 to 10 feet below. Oh crap, says I, going to examine it and expecting to find - in this order (1) the speaker shattered into bits, or (2) massive dents (3) internal damage, rattle or non function. Instead, it was unscratched and working perfectly. I would be even more surprised if Bose's competitors survived this test.
customer_reviews.author: Zonk

customer_reviews.title: Superb High Quality sounds only Bose can deliver
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great Bluetooth speaker by Bose. The crisp and clear sounds are enjoyable just about anywhere. Amazing how this small speaker transforms any space and surrounds it with sounds. Listen to your favorite tunes as you work on a project or even if just to relax. For whatever it is, you will enjoy this Bose Bluetooth speaker and immerse yourself with high quality sounds. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: FEW INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.text: the volume button did not work = I called Bose helpline 3 times and had long online chat with agent = no joy. There are very few instructions, they don't even explain what all the buttons are for ?? = they tell you to press the multi=function button but don't explain which button that is ?? Then there's the serial number nightmare = you have to have this in order to receive advice from helpline but it is IMPOSSIBLE to read in miniscule shiny writing on the base of product. Why do they make it SO difficult ?? I was so looking forward to this product but sadly I have had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lane

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and its a great purchase. Its small enough to not be conspicuous but provides a nice BIG sound. The portability is great. Its super easy to use and very easy to connect your phone to. The battery lasts a long time. It was great for us to use painting a room. left it outside the room behind the closed door and it was plenty loud and we controlled it from our phone in the room very easy. I can this coming in super handy during the summer sitting out on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Thornwood Mom

customer_reviews.title: fabulous speaker
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with this speaker. You can install the Bose app on your phone to adjust the settings (e.g. turn off the creepy voice). It sounds nice, and the battery lasts plenty long. One issue I have with it, when it's connected via bluetooth, it is not possible to adjust the speaker volume. I have to put select wired mode, then adjust the volume, then go back to bluetooth mode. This is an issue e.g. if volume gets lowered on wired mode and then is not loud enough in bluetooth mode when my phone is at max.
customer_reviews.author: JupiterandDavid

customer_reviews.title: Bose Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Bose speaker. It has good sound, but not WOW! Like I had expected. I needed a bluetooth speaker to be able to sound great for about 20 people for outdoor movie, I really don't know if this is going to make it good enough. BOSE, CAN YOU HELP ME WITH WHAT I MIGHT NEED.....I called and asked advice but, really not sure if they really knew about the product they are selling.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBird

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Sounds So Good!
customer_reviews.text: For now using with a sleep sounds app (relax melodies); and it works great at filling the room with the sounds i select to fall asleep to. I cannot say much for the battery, as I leave it plugged in for now next too my bed. It's not too heavy and the build quality seems sturdy enough to survive a drop from a small height. The quality in audio is amazing! In the past I have used the same app with headphones; but after listening to them with this speaker; it's like rediscovering all new sounds as I can now truly hear them at their full potential.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound. I paired this with a Bose soundlink micro in stereo mode and could not be happier. Mine shipped with the April 2019 software and I have had no problems at all. Thinking of buying a 2nd to use in place of my micro for stero. The Bose app to connect 2 is useless after the first time. I use the button method. You will need to hold the second set for awhile but it does work. It will connect in party mode. For stereo, press and hold BT/+ again on either speaker.
customer_reviews.author: DJCTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Just get it. You won’t regret it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I’ve made on amazon. I can’t say enough about it. I use it everyday, the battery lasts for DAYS without needing a charge. I took it on vacation and didn’t need a charge the entire time. And it’s very durable. Even when the volume is high, it doesn’t sound distorted. Don’t wait, just get it!! And the base charger is SO worth it!!!! Don’t get it without the base charger.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: True to the Bose standard of quality you expect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The sound is rich and it gets LOUD. I work in film and television and this thing has FILLED a giant empty stage with music as we built up cameras. I also take it into the shower and carry it in my backpack when going on bicycle rides (not only do you avoid headphones, but it helps pedestrians hear you approaching and they are FAR less likely to step out in front of you unwittingly- and it even helps cars be aware of you if you're in their blind spot). You will be completely satisfied with this purchase. Take it everywhere, the beach, the office, the shower and enjoy your favorite tunes!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Diaz de Lindo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my office at work most of the time. It fills the room with sound at any volume. I have cranked up the volume and it's impressive but what amazes me even more is how good it sounds at low volumes. It's great for enjoying music without annoying my coworkers. I have had other bluetooth speakers and they were good as long as the volume was up high enough. With the Bose I can hear every word & note regardless of volume. The battery life is great. I did buy the charging cradle and I reccomend you get that too. It makes charging so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Battery life no where near 16 hours
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and have used it twice thinking I would be able to use it several times before needing to charge it. The first time was on the golf course for 1 1/2 hours and the 2nd time was for 2 hours on the golf course and the battery was dead. Not sure how I only got just under 4 hours and it said it should last 16 hours. Tempted to return it as thats the reason why I upgraded to this version. The sound is amazing however so I am not knocking the quality of the unit...just the battery. If you can plug it in while using it thats your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker! The sound it produces is amazing. I would definitely recommend it. I paired it with my iPad (very easy to do) and listen to music and streaming radio. The speaker can be used connected to a power source or run on battery. It has a long battery life - every bit of the advertised 16 hours. Love the portability. I take the speaker only with me to whatever room of the house I am spending time in. Doesn't matter where the iPad is, the speaker works in any room. On/off and volume can be controlled from either the speaker or my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my application.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a large two car garage that is a woodworking shop. I had a Bose mobile speaker for the last four years that worked very well but stopped connecting to my iPhone when I upgraded to the iPhone 8. I’m not an audiophile but the sound quality is great for what I use this for...it fills the garage with good bass and treble as well as clarity. It connects very quickly to the phone via Bluetooth when it’s turned on. For my application I’m very pleased and have no complaints. It performs as I expected and I feel comfortable recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Callmepat

customer_reviews.title: One is great.  Two are crap.
customer_reviews.text: The sound on the model is pretty amazing. It can fill a room. Batter life is outstanding. I do. Or even have to recharge it when we have an all day pool party. What stinks is the pairing mode. I have two of these speakers and they pair for stereo sound. But they lose this pairing every 10 minutes or so and it is often futile to even try to repair after the lose connection. That aspect is very frustrating. The only reason I am not rating it lower than 4 stars is because the sound is so good as a si glee speaker the stereo pairing g really isn’t even needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: A lot of sound from such a small speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This a a great little speaker! I’ve enjoyed it way more that I thought I would. It’s so easy to carry around and it really does fill a whole room up with sound. The only bad thing and it’s a big one it has horrible connectivity issues want stay connected. This really needs to be fixed. Nocking 2 stars off for this reason. Fix this and I’ll give a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Randall F

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, Awesome battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I went into the big box stores to compare the Revolve + versus the others. Once I demo'd them all, it was hands down the best buy. I haven't regretted by decision yet. The battery life is amazing. The 360 sound is what you expect from Bose. The bass form this thing is my favorite. Once I figured out how to adjust the EQ on my Apple Music app, I was able to get just the right kind of sound I was looking for. The price is coming down from what it use to be. If you're in the market for a powerful but compact portable speaker. This is the one!
customer_reviews.author: steve campos

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, a few problems.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This speaker sounds great. I bought it to compliment my sound bar and base module. Thinking it would add a surround sound effect and be a portable option to take outside etc. Cons: It will need to charge fully before it will pair with the other speakers. It frequent disconnects and you have to reconnect it. There was a significant delay when we were watching football on broadcast television last night, but not when we were listening to music earlier. Not sure what that’s about. Overall it’s a great little speaker, but has some kinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, terrible Bluetooth!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great for a small speaker, nice bass and not muddy, good clarity, but I’m not an audiophile just someone who appreciates good sound. But......the Bluetooth on this is horrible, many of my devices including Bose products automatically connect this one I have to manually connect every time and then when I do no sound comes out at all or is very low despite both the source and this device manually being turned all the way up. And then when I finally get it to connect correctly it starts blasting. Very frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: NomadCC

customer_reviews.title: WOW  - amazing surround sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have the small portable bose speaker for 2-3 years now and have really enjoyed it - but decided it was time for an upgrade and all I can say is WOW !! The surround sound is AMAZING!!!! I love the handle as well (little things make me happy :) A great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan T. Evans

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year later
customer_reviews.text: This is after 1year review. Sound quality stayed the same( 5 stars) But battery from 14/15h went down to 6/7h Bluettuth connectivity wasn't best to start but now beein 5/6 feet apart and my phone beeing in my pocket they are a glitches. Over all payed $300 for a good quality product that after 6/8 months went down. So far on the market there is no good competition for the sound quality in that price range.
customer_reviews.author: Jonasz

customer_reviews.title: Average quality- for everyone
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this disappoints. I have seen tiny bookshelf speakers (Bose Included) that put out better lows than this. Given the size and what I thought engineering could be done from the shape, I expected a little more. Connectivty is good. I have not used the battery feature.
customer_reviews.author: DCF

customer_reviews.title: Not even "humidity resistant"
customer_reviews.text: The speaker spent the night outside under the covered deck: 80 F with no rain, and didn't work in the morning ! Not acceptable for a brand and price like this
customer_reviews.author: Pierre 30004

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker with nice bass response. I was hesitant to spend the money, but it is well worth it. I have an "Old School" stereo system that I've had since the 80's. I recently connected it to a Wi-Fi transmitter through the earphone jack and now am able to listen to it from this Bose speaker in any room of my house and front or back yard. I suspect my system could blow it out if I cranked it to hi volume, but I am impressed that at low to medium listening volumes it sounds as good as my very expensive Klipsch stereo speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Trapani

customer_reviews.title: 3 hour battery life at 70% volume
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great but it's more like a 3 hour battery life on 70% volume. I think you could get 16 hours out of it if you listened on 5% volume while flying in a fighter jet over multiple time zones and you calculated the time change. Definitely a letdown and my worst Bose purchase yet. Don't know about the rain thing, honestly don't see much sense in leaving a $300 speaker in the rain. Most definitely would never buy again and highly recommend that you don't either! Something about it taking longer to charge then it lasts really sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: No issues. Love.
customer_reviews.text: Great for large living rooms...deep bass. Wouldn't use at a party....instead would get the biggest JBL speaker....can't think of the name of that...effortless wireless connection. Beware women...when you get make up on the rubber-y top part, that's really hard to get off (wink). Satisfied. Very. Love the handle...they should have put that on the other Revolve (why not)? Oh well, someone probably too afraid of the boss to suggest it. Ha ha. Bought the insurance on it but probably won't need it....that's how good Bose is. Buy and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely low quality! Stops working after 5 months--my THIRD one!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I purchase this speaker, it stops working after 5-6 months! Really, Bose? Terrible! Just will not play. Just stops. This one was purchased March 29, 2020. Today is August 22, 2020. I should get replacement. There is NO warranty unless you purchase one!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: One is great. Two are better.
customer_reviews.text: You think you already have a bluetooth speaker? Think again. These will blow your mind. Buy two, connect them together through Bose Connect App and OH MY!! The sound these little thing crank out are insane. Stand anywhere near them in stereo mode and your in a bubble of music that is incredible. Bose outdid themselves. My only complaint is that you can’t link more than two together. I’d love to hear this quadraphonically. Get on it Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Advent Remote RF speaker. One thing I didn't like about it was the variable tuning. Stand in the wrong place and you got a lot of loud white noise. Not so with the Bose. I use this in the bathroom for tunes in the shower. Works great. My only quibble is that it will go on as soon as it detects the Bluetooth signal. In my estimation, the off switch should really mean off. I can live with that. One weird hitch though. There is a very slight delay in signal which makes it seem like an echo against my stereo (which I'm using to transmit to it.)
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. James

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: When I received this speaker, I was truly disappointed. I have 2 SoundTouch 300 sound bars plus the sub woofers and they are great. On this speaker, it looks and feels cheap. It has no usb ports to charge other devices if you need to--in my opinion this is truly a great option. I am sticking with the JBL devices...they sound great and I can charge other devices if I need to. With this device, you are paying for just a name.....in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is high end. It puts out great sound that you can hear throughout the room and into other areas of our first floor home. Plus the bass is noticeable with a good clean sound. I use this in our kitchen with an Amazon Echo Dot connected it with it to provide multi-room music throughout the home. It's linked up with other echo dots that are either connected with cheaper bluetooth speakers or sound systems to give me the convenience and flexibility of having music being played throughout the entire house. The Bose speaker is a very nice component of that system.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Added a 2nd speaker to pair with the my first one. When they are synced...sounds is amazing! The connect in stereo. I had many compliments on them. The only complaint is the Bose app for pairing them can be finicky. Sometimes takes 3 or 4 tries to link them.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Get the Soundlink Mini instead
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't sound any better than my Bose Soundlink Mini so it certainly is not worth the extra cost. It sounds good and the battery life is better than the mini so if a really long battery life is a priority then it might be worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: I am an audiophile. I love sound quality, and cannot stand to even listen to anything coming from a speaker that isn't of superior quality. Call me a snob... I don't care. I love this speaker. The balance of sound is superior. The low end is very present, and the mids and highs are very balanced. I was cautious when buying, and now that I have it, I am extremely pleased. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bcb

customer_reviews.title: It sounds great and the battery last a long time
customer_reviews.text: The speaker was High quality and I Love how long the battery lasts. I also bought also bought the circular charging station that the speaker is supposed to sit on. But the design for where the power cable connects to the charging station is hard to get to and the connection is very iffy. I had to jam a piece of paper between the underside of the station and the plug to keep the contacts touching. Very bad plug design for the charging station. The charging connector on the speaker works just fine. Get the speaker but not the charging station.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplistic design. Although this is larger than the Revolve, it is still very manageable and does not take up a lot of space. Very good sound quality, but I think the 360 sound dynamics will take a bit of adjusting to. It is very cool to be able to walk around the room with consistent sound. This would be perfect if the price point was where the Revolve was. From other reviews, it doesn't seem like the extra $100 has much bang for your buck. The set up was perhaps the easiest product set up that I have experienced. Overall, the product seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound but Lags.
customer_reviews.text: The sounds is GREAT, but I bought 2 of these guys and returned them. Why? Because I have it connected through Bluerooth through my laptop and there is a lag between the music that is playing to the speakers. I thought I can by pass this since it really does sound awesome and like the look and setup, but I decided the lag was an annoyance. Fix that Bose. I would recommend it on the beach, listening in the house, but if you need to listen to it for a movie, I'd pass.
customer_reviews.author: I Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Worth every penny, best little speaker around!!
customer_reviews.text: Great, Great product. You get what you pay for, sound is unbelievable, we visited a local electronic store and listened to several like products to see which one we wanted to purchase, this speaker by far had the best sound in that price range and even above. Wouldn't purchase anything else, the battery stays charged for quite a long period, just couldn't be any happier with it, can take it anywhere, sound comes out from all sides, easy bluetooth hookup. My son takes it to the high school football locker room and they jam out before games and practices, we use it pool side, in the garage, around the campfire etc. Love, Love this speaker!!! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: MY BABY
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SPEAKER. Amazing bass and overall sound. I bring it everywhere I go (I'm a bit of an audiophile) and people are instantly jealous. Placed in a corner, you can pretty well fill a large kitchen with sound. I'm considering getting a second one for the pairing abilities and turned up outdoor moments. Battery life isn't quite as long as they say if you're at higher volumes, but that's a given, considering the impressive bass. The handle is a HUGE plus by the way. you don't realize just how unwieldly these kinda speakers are till you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Iso

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Hmm, where to start. it is very durable. I took it on vacation this summer and it survived several flights and was used every night on our week long trip. It syncs up very well with my iphone 6s and sound good. I took off a star for the high price and the fact that I'm not sure it sounds much better than another product that I bought from a competitor for about 1/2 the price. I do not crank up my music, and don't rock out any more, so that isn't it.. It should last a long time though. Oh, and i did buy the charging base, which is not needed.
customer_reviews.author: D.Ayotte

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker approaching two months now, and couldn't be happier. It easily Bluetooth-paired with my iMac. I can take the speaker in any room in my normal-sized house and enjoy some nice sound. On occasion, it will develop an annoying "hum" at extreme ranges when I have the sound cranked up perhaps a little too loud. Overall, I am much pleased with the speaker and the sound it produces.
customer_reviews.author: Demon Desert

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fantastic music option
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Bose Bluetooth speaker I have purchased and this one is my favorite. The speaker itself is revolving in nature and good sound protrudes from all sides. The unit is water resistant and can be used close to showers and pools with low risk. The unit can connect multiple devices at once and has a neat little handle for carrying purposes. The speaker is small but packs a huge punch with good bass as most Bose speakers do. In all this is a great option as I find it more durable than past Bose speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Maczka

customer_reviews.title: Best sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: My husband secretly ordered this speaker for me & I was really surprised at the sound quality. I didn't know much about Bose until recently but after comparing sound output from this product vs the other one I'd had in mind, I am truly blown away at the output. The highs are crisp & the lows are clear. The sound is very, VERY high quality. The system isn't small like the Echo or others like it but the larger size allows for much better sound quality. The docking station doesn't come with it & that is the charging station.
customer_reviews.author: Stan C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I'm really into bluetooth speakers I watched all the reviews I was on the fence between the jbl extreme 1 or this the one thing the jbl had that was really appealing was the fact that you can charge 2 devices with it the down side is all the horrible reviews I read about the battery itself so a speaker then can charge 2 devices won't do u much good if its battery sucks I'm really pleased with this Bose. battery life is good and in my opinion you can't go wrong with 360 degree sound with Bose quality
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love Bose but I did not notice a difference
customer_reviews.text: I did not notice a difference between this and my JBL. I have a JBL Charge 4, and I could not tell the difference. My friends could not either. :/ It is prettier than my JBL. It has the cute little handle, unlike my JBL. IT ANNOUNCES callers on the speaker by name -if you do not want to get busted, I'd thought you should know this. LOL The price is not worth buying if it is pretty much no better than my JBL. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M

customer_reviews.title: Charging problems persist
customer_reviews.text: I really hate to give such a great speaker a One star rank, but this speaker has had charging problems from the beginning. Even after returning to Bose for repair it will not charge. Tried everything suggested by Bose but this problem persists. Sadly this will be our last Bose product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A.

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds like it has a towel wrapped around it, the bass isn't clear and it covers up all the other instruments. Tried it with several types of songs, variety of volumes, extremely disappointed. I alternated playing the same songs on the Revolve+ and on my $50 JBL speaker and the JBL was MUCH better. Returned the Bose SoundLink Revolve+ the following day.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Neveau

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great—most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, so that I could pair them in party mode and stereo mode, and each have the same flaw when connecting via Bluetooth About a third of the time, after connecting to my iPad or iPhone, the volume is very low. I power off the speaker, then power on, and it reconnects and is much louder, sounding great. Why do I need to reconnect so often to get the full sound? I keep the firmware and the Bose connect app updated. Perhaps this can be fixed in a future firmware update?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound! Bose Revolve plus
customer_reviews.text: Just what like I expected from Boss! This is my first Bose product, and I think I am already hooked! Plays nice with rich bass! It fills up my room of about 20x20 easily. Using it with google home and also to play music from my iPhone. Connected easily and took very little time. I purchased it with a charging cradle, which is convenient but not necessary to purchase with this speaker, as it comes with a charging cable. About twice in size as of a medium size coffee mug. Sleek and charming!
customer_reviews.author: Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: Father's day gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for father's day. He always has music playing, and this is a huge hit!! The sound is phenominal. Wish I had pictures of all the places this speaker has been. On the roof, while he was shingling the shed roof, in the garden, on the deck, under the deck, and even in the outdoor chapel when our daughter got married. He can't live without it now. He tells everybody that comes to the house about the great sound. Glad I bought it..
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Stearns

customer_reviews.title: The sound is pretty good and the pairing with another is a great ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty good and the pairing with another is a great feature and can run in stereo mode or party mode. I think it is a little subpar for Bose. It doesn't seem to go as loud and clear as other Bose products. it also has challenges pairing with each other, there is a lot of back and forth and then they finally pair. I'm on the fence on this one and will update after a little more time using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Moore

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases, period!
customer_reviews.text: I had absolutely no idea how much I would like this product. So easy to set up, great sound, long lasting battery and on and on and on. I really enjoy taking this Bose Soundlink out on my patio in the morning and stream some SiriusXM to it while enjoying a cup of coffe reading the WSJ. Then do a few chores and take it over to the pool and again enjoy streaming some of my playlists while working on a tan and swimming. So easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: dfwsig

customer_reviews.title: great sound clarity at low volume
customer_reviews.text: being a senior with hearing loss i needed a device that i could hear what was being said on tv without using close captioned. I was having to turn up the volume on the soundbar but still could not hear with any clairity. with the bose soundlink: revolve i can now keep the volume low and better understand what is being said. that being said. this is not a substitute for hearing aids, but it sure does help
customer_reviews.author: waldo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: If you prefer quality over quantity, then the Bose Soundlink Revolve + is the speaker for you. It produces amazing, sound that fills the room equally in every direction. With the Bose app, you can turn on the speaker, connect and play music from across the room with your phone. It is very portable with the little handle. I also bought the charging cradle which makes is easy to just set the speaker on it to charge. Battery Life is excellent. It does get pretty loud for being a mid size speaker; however, the sound quality maintains throughout. I have other bluetooth speakers that get louder; however, at a certain point it's no longer quality music... it's just noise.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Betts

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker if it’s on sale
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale for $239.99 which was a great deal. I don’t think it’s worth $299.99 full price but at $239.99 it sounds great and the battery lasts a long time, also the bose connect app works excellently which is nice because other similar apps for these types of speakers are usually really bad. I just wish this charged on a usb-c and not micro.
customer_reviews.author: Spaghettisaurusrex

customer_reviews.title: It's a Bose
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? The volume, the bass, the sound quality... what's not to like about a Bose... I brought it to church one day and my pastor had me to order one for him. He attached it to his tv sound system and because his house is small it was perfect!! As for me, I love the clarity, and when I crank it up there is no distortion in sound, just perfect music... LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker. The sound quality is phenomenal. The battery life is great. Lasts for several days. I have to charge it once a week with normal use of about 2-3 hours a day. I now have it permanently mounted and plugged in in my living room though. Never has connection issues. Fills the whole room with excellent sound. I’m going to be getting another one soon for use in my shop. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ShotShell

customer_reviews.title: Great sound small package
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother who is a dj and doesnt always want to walk around with his equipment to backyard. He loves the sound great bass quality and large sound for it being so small. Great value, keeping the Bose quality. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! LOVE IT! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly awesome and simply a great piece of creation by Bose. I ordered this product because I was really bored and that turned out to be awesome sounding thing for me. I have another Bluetooth speaker too, I am actually fond of trying new stuff! Number 1, it sounds awesome even if I want to do a soft music piece amd want to sleep. Number 2, it is perfect for carrying a party near pool or in a party hall. It is loud enough and sound is clear. Falling in love with some already favs. Lol. Thanks Amazon for delivering it before time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it! So easy
customer_reviews.text: Got it today. I adore the sound and quality! Just don't be tricked into buying the base charger! No need!!i got that and the case and didn't need either but I so needed the 360! I absolutely love it! So easy. Can anyone tell me if I can add speakers to this? This is my second Bose dock and this dock Has some great sound! ! Would never settle for less! Love it!!!!!! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Louise

customer_reviews.title: Beware Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, links great, sounds great, BUT, the battery life is horrible. Was stunned that after 3 hours it was nearly dead. I will get another JBL. Jam all day without worrying about battery at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hochstetler

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product because in the picture it shows a raindrops on it and I thought this would be nice to have outside when it starts to rain a little I bought it less than 6 months ago Bose refuses to replace or repair the product saying that it's IP for water resistant after explaining that I had it outside slacklining with friends when it started raining they immediately decided that it wasn't their problem Even though in the picture you can clearly see a bunch of raindrops on it Bose has horrible customer service I have been a lifelong supporter but never again Sonos all the way
customer_reviews.author: marc williams

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity is a problem
customer_reviews.text: This speaker worked for about five months and then after that connected mostly with my iPhone but only sporadically with my Macbook. I tried turning on and off my bluetooth connections, turned on and off the speaker and my devices, put my devices right next to the speaker, tried everything, but it no longer connects to my laptop. Basically, I've got a $300 speaker that is finicky. Not cool. On a good day will play from my iPhone. On a bad day will play from nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Third Plebeian

customer_reviews.title: Portable, loud and sounds like a system three times larger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the beach, backyard and pool. It is plenty loud, easy to carry and has really great fidelity. It's a Bose! You know what that means. I haven't run the batteries out yet even after playing for 5 hours it is still going strong. Tip: Get the charging base, it makes recharging as easy as putting it down.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed with this Bose Revolve+
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my wife and as soon as I heard the music I knew it would be a GREAT gift! Pairing with our iPhones was flawless. ability to control playback and volume with either iPhone is a great feature. The only negative and it’s minor was the packing; very nice appearance but I could not repackage it properly once I opened it to Test it prior to gift wrapping; a real hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Glencoe resident

customer_reviews.title: Great details. Same good bass. VERY portable.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old BOSE Soundlink with this Revolve+. 1. Better sound - more detailed. Better mids and highs. Bass the same great BOSE sound. I listen most to jazz, classic and mainstream background music. 2. Simple since it it is not critical in what direction you position the speaker. 3. Clean sound. Even when using AppleMusic or other compressed formats. Hard to pinpoint but just makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: BasilFawlty

customer_reviews.title: Bose: Still the Best
customer_reviews.text: After all these years, Bose still makes the best speakers. I’ve had a Soundlink for many years and it is still performing flawlessly. I recently decided I wanted a second one for my vacation home and tried buying a cheap home speaker that got thousands of great reviews. It was awful. So I bought the new Bose Soundlink and man, what an absolute pleasure. It’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Rider

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound
customer_reviews.text: 2 Stars only for portability and ease-of-use. The sound sucks compared to my 1990s stereo set. I will be going back to CDs again and playing on my stereo. There's no way around it, the only way to get good sound is to have space and that means big speakers. And you only get that with the old school stereo systems.
customer_reviews.author: jude

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I keep background music on all day in my house so the unit is on from 12 to 14 hours a day. I only have to charge it every three days. I love that I can sit it on the coffee table and have great sound anywhere in the room. One word of caution, you should always use the USB charger that comes with the unit. I used a cable that I keep plugged into a special USB wall socket for convenience and found that it didn’t always charge fully. I thought USB was USB but apparently not.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little speaker
customer_reviews.text: The brand Bose speaks quality! I have the JBL Charge 2 and the Pulse 3. The Pulse stopped charging after about a year. For a little speaker the Bose packs good power and a deep bass sound. I like the optional charging cradle too. If you are willing to dish out a little more money id recommend the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and we use it a lot - the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and we use it a lot - the battery at least in these first few months seems to have good life. The only thing that I'm less happy with is the documentation that comes with it. There have been a couple of times it has needed resetting and the information that you can find online about how to trouble shoot problems is far better than anything in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Hammersfan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: As an audiophile, for a small bluetooth speaker these sound excellent at this price point. I prefer them over the competitors at this price point. They travel well. I bought 2 and often use them strapped to a cart when golfing. The screw mount on the bottom and strap make it easy to put them anywhere. I get many complements on how great they sound. As with any speaker, position is important. I prefer them high up and against walls or in corners. I also prefer stereo mode over mono if the situation permits.
customer_reviews.author: fishlabs

customer_reviews.title: Pairing is delightfully easy. Links to multiple devices at same time. Apple and otherwise
customer_reviews.text: It's so handy. Powerful sound. Surprised me to hear notes of my favorite playlist for the first time in a portable unit. I have Bose computer speakers (they rock), three different Bose headsets, Apple iBuds for iPhone 10 and a handful of other portable speakers. SoundLink Revolve+ beats all. Plus it links simultaneously to multiple devices including across platforms of Apple and Samsung devices (as well as my Mac and HP computers. Yes, I love music. I would buy black next time.
customer_reviews.author: InJoy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker! Sound is awesome, bass sounds great. Love the built in handle. Doesn’t quite last 10 hrs like co. claims but I can’t complain because I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Rach L

customer_reviews.title: BEST BLUETOOTH SPEAKER EVER-PURE BOSE
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME. Bose is stocked with aliens who make space age sound come from small packages. This small speaker is quite loud, it fills my large backyard with great sound and deep base. I have had other Bose products and this is the best one yet I have owned. It is worth every dollar I spent on this thing. the battery lasts a good 6 hours at least of direct use. It's very elegant and annouces out loud when ready and when connected via blue tooth. I haven't tried the app yet because I have been enjoying it so much
customer_reviews.author: captwilb

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound / item
customer_reviews.text: Just like always - Bose blows. The muffled sound of this device is like all the other overpriced Bose bombs. Boomy bottoms, muffled highs. Very poor sound. Especially for 300 bucks. Plus there are serious software issues. I do not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Volume around pool allows conversation, some distortion when next to a wall
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product in many ways but the sound reviews here fell a little short for us. Indoors, it's beautiful and the design could not be more convenient, so 5 stars there. We find the loudest level permits conversation around the pool unless right next to us. We hang it from a Christmas light hook screwed into the wood fascia. I detect distortion at its highest level when set or hung in front of a wall (like in the attached photo) but none when in front of out covered patio.
customer_reviews.author: MikeInWeston

customer_reviews.title: Horrible update service.
customer_reviews.text: Bose firmware updates have literally destroyed my two revolve plus speakers. No base, half the volume and scratchy sound. Online help is clueless and scratching at straws. Previous firmware is not available through the update program. Shipping to a service center from Kodiak while out of warranty is more expensive than a new set. I am livid.
customer_reviews.author: James park cannon

customer_reviews.title: Needs more options
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome, the only thing that is missing from this unit is a pause/FF buttons skip/back button. I know you can do it on your device but the newer version has this option. The battery life is awesome sound is the same. I would buy the newer version of this if I had known these buttons/options were not on this unit. This would have been 5 stars if this would have been on the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Kish

product_meta.title: Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Portable and Long-Lasting Bluetooth 360 Speaker - Triple Black
product_meta.description: Color:Triple Black| Style:Speaker onlyImportant Information : SoundLink Revolve speakers keep track of the last eight devices that were paired and connected to them, dropping the least recently used device when a new one is paired. While not playing music, much of the SoundLink Revolve speakers' battery charge can be recovered in approximately four hours when using a USB power source. Charging from alternative USB power sources or when playing music may take longer. Battery performance can vary with the content played and volume at which it is played. When a call comes in, the music will pause and the call will ring through the speaker. You can answer the call by pressing the multi function button and talk into the speaker itself to conduct your phone call. When you end your call, music playback resumes.Using the Bose Connect app, you can enable Party Mode from any of the following Bose Bluetooth speakers: SoundLink Revolve and SoundLink Revolve.
feature_bullets: Delivers Deep, loud, jaw dropping sound with True 360 degree coverage
Built-in mic for speakerphone to take clear conference or personal calls out loud with a wireless range of approximately 30 feet.
Flexible fabric handle makes it easy to grab and go; seamless aluminum body is durable and water resistant (IPX4)
Enjoy up to 16 hours of play time from a long-lasting, rechargeable, lithium-ion battery
Wireless Bluetooth pairing with voice prompts allows you to easily take calls and access your phone’s virtual assistant — hands free
Pair two SoundLink speakers together for party mode or stereo mode or use Bose SimpleSync technology to pair with a member of the Bose Smart Home Family to play in sync
